JUST ARRIVED * BY MAIL STEAMER.

THE LATEST FASHIONABLE WINTER COLOURS-PLUM, PURPLE, DARK BROWN. ALSO ' WITH THEM OUR OLD FAVOURITES

NAVY BLUE, MAROON, NUT BROWN, BLAOK, &o" &»., &c.

MAYPOlVE SOAP.-BLAOK is unequalled amongst Dyes. It dyes a Deep Rich Black, not the dead, rusty, poverty-looking black oí nearly all dyos.

With. MAYPOLH SOAP you liavo no trouble, no mess ; any child who follows the simple instructions can dye equal to tho giown-urj folks. You could hardly

credit the beauty and variety oi colours of the clothes, &o., sent in to U3 dyed by children fiom 9 to 1G years of age in our Dyeing Competition for the bonefifc-of tho '

Infants' Home in December last.

With combination of colours you can make hundreds of shades. We will be pleased to give you free ndvioo on Dyeing by letter. Don't hesitate to write. We have

experts ready to answer all queries.

MAYPOLE SOAP dyes Blouses, Dresses, Ribbons, Children's Frocks, Pinafores, Petticoats, Overalls, Socks, Stockings, Silk Gloves,'Lamp Shados,_ Silk Scarves,

Shoes, Fans, Gentlemon's Underclothing, Collars, Pniasols, &c.

DOES NOT WASn OUT OR EADE. DOES NOT STAIN THE HANDS.
